The environment includes a window frame and interior wall surfaces nearby, with the sea visible outside. The camera is positioned at approximately eye level relative to the seated subject, using a normal to short-telephoto perspective with no wide-angle distortion. prompt:
A highly realistic photographic portrait of an adult woman (early 20s) with long, straight hair naturally parted in the center. Her facial features and proportions appear natural and believable, with subtle asymmetry and a relaxed, confident presence. No stylization or artificial perfection.ï»¿
Pose & Body Language:ï»¿
She is seated at a wooden table, leaning slightly forward in a natural, intimate posture. Her left hand gently cups her cheek and jawline with relaxed fingers, while her right arm rests extended on the table surface. Her head is tilted subtly to the right, creating a soft, engaging line through the neck and shoulders. Direct eye contact with the camera, paired with a calm, confident smile that feels genuine and unforced.ï»¿
Skin & Makeup Realism:ï»¿
Skin shows visible pores, natural texture, and smooth but realistic tonal transitions. Soft blush blends naturally into the skin. Makeup is defined yet believable: sharp winged eyeliner, well-groomed brows, matte mauve-brown lipstick without excessive saturation. No flawless skin, no plastic sheen â€” only a gentle light-induced glow.ï»¿
Attire & Details:ï»¿
She wears a tight-fitting white long-sleeve top in a bodysuit style with a wide square neckline. Fabric appears slightly elastic with realistic stretch, natural folds, and subtle tension across the shoulders and chest. Large silver hoop earrings catch the ambient light with soft reflections, not exaggerated shine.ï»¿
Environment:ï»¿
An indoor cafÃ© or restaurant setting near water (lakeside or seaside). A large glass window behind her opens to the exterior view, integrating the subject naturally into the environment rather than isolating her from it.ï»¿
Background (Through the Window):ï»¿
A blue-hour twilight scene with a deep blue sky and calm water surface. Distant city lights shimmer softly across the lake or bay, forming natural light trails and reflections. The background remains slightly out of focus, preserving depth and realism.ï»¿
Lighting:ï»¿
Mixed, realistic lighting conditions. Cool blue ambient light spills in from the window, contrasting with warm tungsten interior light illuminating her face and upper body. Gentle shadows form along the cheekbones, jawline, neck, and collarbones. Subtle reflections of warm interior string lights are visible on the glass window, adding depth and atmosphere.ï»¿
Decor Accents:ï»¿
Natural dried pampas grass or thatch elements hang from the ceiling, partially visible at the top of the frame, softly blurred and consistent with the interiorâ€™s aesthetic.ï»¿
Camera & Style:ï»¿
Shot as a candid lifestyle portrait with a 50â€“85mm lens look, shallow depth of field. Flash photography influence with controlled highlights, natural grain, and a slightly film-like texture. High-definition realism, no CGI, no illustration feel.ï»¿
Mood & Vibe:ï»¿
Quietly confident, intimate, and cinematic. A refined, real-world fashion portrait captured during a calm blue-hour moment â€” natural, atmospheric, and effortlessly authentic.

prompt: Create a hyper-realistic professional fashion photograph.  SUBJECT & IDENTITY (TEXTUAL LOCK) The subject is an adult young man with a slim, youthful build. Face shape is narrow oval with soft bone structure, gentle jawline, and a straight nose. Eyes are expressive and slightly wide-set. Skin texture is clean and natural with visible pores, smooth surface, and subtle tonal variation. No acne, no pimples, no inflammation. No retouching. No beautification. No AI smoothing.  Hair is medium length, naturally wavy, slightly messy, with loose strands falling forward. The subject wears thin, round metal-framed eyeglasses. Posture is upright but tense, shoulders slightly raised, conveying alertness.  This description must be followed exactly. No facial or body alteration. No stylization.  SCENE This is a real fashion photograph shot by a professional photographer. This is NOT an illustration. This is NOT a drawing. This is NOT a graphic poster. This is NOT a cinematic or fantasy frame.  Location: controlled studio or neutral indoor environment. Background: deep matte red backdrop with subtle texture, evenly lit, non-graphic. Atmosphere: serious, restrained, grounded in reality. Fashion intent: conceptual fashion editorial portrait, photographic only.  POSE â€” FIXED GEOMETRY The subject is turned in a three-quarter back-facing pose. Upper body angled away from camera. Head turned back over the shoulder toward camera. One hand holds a long, thin object (wooden or metal rod) resting diagonally across the back. Shoulders slightly hunched under a heavy garment. No pose variation. No action.  EXPRESSION & GAZE Gaze direction: looking back toward the camera from the corner of the eyes. Facial expression: focused, alert, restrained. No smile. No dramatization.  CAMERA & COMPOSITION Professional still photo camera. Lens: 85mm. Camera height: eye level. Distance: medium portrait distance. Perspective: natural compression. Framing: mid-torso portrait. Orientation and aspect ratio: vertical, 4:5. No wide-angle. No cinematic framing.  LIGHTING Lighting follows strict studio photography rules. Main light: neutral directional key light from the front/side. Secondary fill: minimal, only to retain facial detail. No rim drama. No volumetric light. No flares. Shadow behavior: realistic, controlled, non-illustrative.  COLOR & TONALITY Restricted photographic color palette. Dominant colors: deep red background, muted neutrals in clothing. Natural contrast only. No color grading. No posterized tones. No HDR.  WARDROBE & MATERIALS The subject wears a heavy, textured outer garment resembling a coat or cloak. Fabric appears thick, matte, and tactile with visible weave and folds. Inner clothing remains minimal and neutral. All materials obey real gravity and light behavior.  BACKGROUND Real studio background only. Matte red surface with subtle imperfections. No graphic patterns. No paint strokes. No illustration artifacts. prompt: Ultra-realistic high-fashion editorial portrait of the same clean-shaven young male subject from the reference photo â€” facial features must exactly match the reference (do not alter his identity, proportions, or natural expression). Lighting: neutral daylight (5600â€“6500 K) with soft natural shadows; clean whites and accurate skin tones; colors vibrant but not oversaturated; no yellow cast, no HDR glow.  Composition: cinematic three-layer depth â€” foreground bokeh from a rug fringe and a passing chicken close to the lens; midground sharp focus on the model and chair; background rugs and adobe wall slightly defocused with true optical falloff. Strong vertical rug patterns frame the subject naturally.  Textures: realistic matte skin with visible pores and natural fine texture; crisp wool weave on the blazer; subtle silk sheen and thread detail on the scarf; fluid drape of the trousers and soft suede nap on the boots; rug fibers and wooden chair grain rendered clearly. Absolutely no CGI look.  Camera: Canon or Nikon full-frame, 50 mm or 85 mm prime lens at f/2.8â€“f/3.2; ISO 100â€“200; shutter 1/250; neutral white balance; light natural vignette only.  Post-production: high-end editorial retouch preserving pores, textile detail, and material texture; no over-smoothing, no halos; elegant neutral color grading with gentle contrast and balanced highlights

prompt:
â€¢ Concept and mood:
â€“ Cinematic, calm, and slightly melancholic alpine portrait. The atmosphere of a cool, windy day in the mountains, a feeling of coziness and simplicity.

â€¢ Location and environment:
â€“ Mountain landscape with snow-covered peaks in the background, a wooden old fence (weathered texture), a clearing with dried grass and soft autumn tones in the foreground.
â€“ Fog/clouds partially cover the peaks, but the shape of the mountains is readable â€” depth of frame and layers.

â€¢ Composition and pose:
â€“ Vertical orientation (portrait format), frame in a 2:3 or 4:5 ratio.
â€“ The subject sits on the top rail of the fence in a semi-profile angle, the torso slightly turned toward the camera, the gaze directed to the side (out of frame) â€” a thoughtful, relaxed state.
â€“ Legs are bent, one leg slightly lowered down, boots against the grass background. Hands rest softly on the knees or hold the edge of the sweater.
â€“ Use the rule of thirds: the subject is shifted slightly left/right, the mountain horizon below the upper third.

â€¢ Clothing and styling:
â€“ Voluminous knitted sweater dress in a cream/milky color with pronounced texture (chunky knit), midi length.
â€“ Beige/ivory boots in a trekking/military style with high socks in a light shade.
â€“ Minimalist accessories: small gold earrings or simple jewelry; natural, unobtrusive hair styling, slightly blowing in the wind.
â€“ Avoid bright brands/logos, clean natural tones.

â€¢ Lighting and time of day:
â€“ Soft diffused light (overcast day or â€œgolden hourâ€ with light cloud cover) â€” avoid harsh shadows.
â€“ Slight back/rim light highlighting the silhouette and the texture of hair/knitted sweater.
â€“ If necessary, use a (warm) reflector or a weak fill flash to emphasize details in the foreground.

â€¢ Technical shooting parameters:
â€“ Camera: full-frame sensor (for example, 35â€“50 MP).
â€“ Lens: portrait telephoto lens 85 mmâ€“135 mm or a 70â€“200 mm zoom; optionally 50 mm for a wider context.
â€“ Aperture: f/1.8â€“f/2.8 for creamy bokeh and separation from the background (or f/2.8â€“f/4 for greater sharpness of the sweater + background).
â€“ ISO: 100â€“400 depending on lighting.
â€“ Shutter speed: 1/200â€“1/500 sec (to freeze slight wind movement).
â€“ White balance: auto / adjust for cold daylight (shift toward cool/neutral tones).

â€¢ Post-processing / stylization:
â€“ Cinematic color grading: cool warmâ€“cool contrasts â€” slightly cool dark areas (teal/green), neutral-warm skin tones and creamy sweaters.
â€“ Increase contrast and local clarity of the knit texture, slightly soften highlights.
â€“ Light vignette and subtle grain for a cinematic feel.
â€“ Exposure correction on the face and clothing details, selective work with shadows and highlights to convey depth.
â€“ Preserve natural skin and fabric texture, avoid excessive retouching.

â€¢ Details for a generative prompt (short version, if needed for AI):
â€“ â€œVertical portrait of a woman in a voluminous cream knitted sweater dress and beige trekking boots, sitting on an old wooden fence in the mountains with snow-covered peaks in the background, windy weather, soft diffused lighting, cinematic color grading, shallow depth of field, 85mm, f/2.0, high resolution, natural textures, minimalist accessoriesâ€.

â€¢ Notes:
â€“ Avoid bright colors in the environment so that attention goes to the sweater texture and silhouette.
â€“ Shoot a series of frames with different apertures and angles: wide shot, medium shot, close-up on the texture of the sweater and boots.
â€“ Ensure safety and stability when sitting on the fence.

The man is posing with his hands fiddling with his wrist or watch and looking directly to the side with a confident expression. The photo is taken outdoors, against a clear blue sky, in New York City, near a barbershop in the 2000s. The background is out of focus.
The lighting is natural, highlighting skin tones and the shine of the accessories. The colors are vivid and saturated, predominantly blue, orange, and white, with high contrast, creating a vibrant, urban feel typical of hip-hop and streetwear editorials from the 2000s.
The camera angle is slightly downward (low angle), highlighting the model's imposing posture. The composition is centered, focusing on the torso and face, captured in portrait (vertical) format, with high resolution (~943Ã—768 px).
The visual effect appears to have slight digital sharpening and increased saturation, reminiscent of photoshoots in rap and streetwear magazines.
author: promptlibrary.space
title: Bulls Vibes

prompt: Create an ultra-realistic 3D commercial-style product shot of a premium cherry juice bottle, suspended mid-air with intricate condensation droplets on its surface. The bottle should appear fresh and vibrant, with each condensation bead reflecting ambient light to enhance photorealism. Surround the product with dynamic elements like splashing droplets of cherry juice, whole cherries, and ice cubes, frozen in high-speed motion, each element sharply defined with vibrant clarity. Floating cherry stems and leaves should also be included to enhance the sense of freshness and energy. Set the background against a rich, deep red and burgundy gradient, which complements the rich color of the cherry juice and evokes a sense of indulgence and premium quality. The product should be centrally placed, slightly tilted to convey a sense of movement and sophistication. Use cinematic, studio-style lighting with bright highlights reflecting off the bottle, crisp shadows, and high contrast to create a luxurious, polished look. Ensure the bottleâ€™s label is clearly visible, with subtle reflections beneath it, adding depth and realism to the scene. The overall aesthetic must evoke indulgence, freshness, and premium quality, with all elements contributing to a high-end, visually striking image. The scene should feel rich, fresh, and full of vitality,with a focus on the vibrant color and fresh nature of the cherry juice. Technical Specifications: Aspect Ratio: 4:5 Resolution: Ultra-HD quality Lighting: Studio-style, cinematic with bright highlights, subtle reflections, and high contrast Detailing: Extreme attention to condensation, droplets, and high-speed motion of elements
author: promptlibrary.space
title: commercial product

prompt: Ultra-realistic cozy Christmas Polaroid-style photograph, warm festive indoor atmosphere. prompt:
Raw, unposed mirror photograph with a documentary, candid feel.ï»¿
A woman stands naturally in a bright white bathroom, captured mid-gesture, as if interrupted during a quiet morning moment. She wears a soft pink silk dressing gown, loosely draped, with visible natural folds and weight of real silk fabric â€” subtle sheen, micro-wrinkles, uneven light reflection.ï»¿
The contrast between the smooth silk robe and natural human skin is emphasized: realistic skin texture with pores, slight redness, soft tonal transitions, no airbrushing. Tattoos on her chest and arms appear authentic â€” real ink density, slight blur at the edges, embedded naturally into the skin rather than floating on top.ï»¿
She holds a smartphone in one hand, partially covering the face, while the other hand rests against her cheek in an instinctive, casual pose. Fingernails have a natural glossy finish with minor imperfections, not overly polished. The mirror reflection is optically correct, with subtle distortion, depth, and light falloff.ï»¿
Lighting is soft, natural, bathroom daylight â€” diffused highlights, gentle shadows, no harsh contrast.ï»¿
Neutral, restrained color palette dominated by whites and skin tones, with muted dusty-pink accents from the robe.ï»¿
Photographerâ€™s perspective: 85mm full-frame look, shallow depth of field, realistic focus falloff, foreground and background separation feels optical, not artificial.ï»¿
Cinematic but grounded realism â€” feels like a real photo taken on a phone or mirror camera, not a styled shoot.ï»¿
Ultra-realistic photography, natural anatomy, authentic proportions, no stylization.ï»¿
Negative prompt:ï»¿
perfect skin, porcelain skin, flawless face, plastic texture, over-sharpened details, beauty retouching, AI smoothness, exaggerated curves, sexualized pose, fashion editorial lighting, studio setup, fantasy realism, CGI look, painterly style

prompt:
Reference image: conceptual variant.
Ultra-detailed outdoor winter portrait of a woman standing at a metal railing overlooking a massive waterfall and rocky canyon.
Face: same woman as in the reference photo; soft smile, relaxed expression, neutral glam makeup with matte pink lips, smooth skin with natural winter flush on cheeks.
Pose: body turned three-quarters to the camera, looking back over her left shoulder; right hand holding a takeaway coffee cup near her chest; left hand relaxed near a black structured handbag hanging from the arm. Hair, loose, falling over the scarf.
Outfit: oversized black glossy puffer jacket with subtle quilting, thick grey wool scarf with large white lettering draped across shoulders and chest; black knit beanie with small red embroidery; slim black pants; black sunglasses with small rounded frames.
Accessories: black structured handbag with short top handle and shoulder strap; minimal gold rings.
Background: dramatic wide waterfall with strong water flow, layered rocky cliffs, mist rising from the falls, muted cloudy sky, cold neutral tones; railing in the foreground with wooden top bar and vertical metal bars.
Lighting: soft diffused daylight from overcast sky, no harsh shadows, cool tones with slight atmospheric haze from mist.
Camera: medium portrait framing from waist up, straight-on angle slightly elevated; crisp focus on the subject with gentle background blur; ultra-sharp details on textures (jacket shine, scarf fibers, hair strands).
Mood: calm winter travel aesthetic, confident yet effortless, luxury minimalism in nature.

base_image:
  use_reference_image: true
  preserve_everything:
    - character identity
    - facial features and expression
    - hairstyle and anatomy
    - outfit design and colors
    - background, lighting, composition
    - overall art style

rules:
  - Only modify the torn-paper interior areas.
  - Do not change pose, anatomy, proportions, clothing details, shading, or scene elements.

effects:
  - effect: "torn-paper-reveal"
    placement: "across chest height"
    description:
      - Add a wide, natural horizontal tear across the chest area.
      - The torn interior uses the style defined in `interior_style`.

  - effect: "torn-paper-reveal"
    placement: "lower abdomen height"
    description:
      - Add a wide horizontal tear across the lower abdomen.
      - The torn interior uses the style defined in `interior_style`.

She wears expressive evening makeup: an even, matte skin tone, warm, brown-gold eyeshadow on the upper lid with a smooth blend, mascara, and a thick, satin lipstick in a neutral beige-pink shade. The woman is wearing a long, milky-cream satin dress with side slits and an open back. The thin straps taper to the low back. The fabric drapes softly and reflects the light in smooth highlights. She wears large, sparkling cluster earrings with clear stones, and several thin silver bracelets and rings. The setting is a dark interior hallway. The background is dark graphite with glossy, reflective sections of the wall. In one shot, a blurred table lamp with a warm lampshade is visible in the background. The background is minimalist, with no noticeable objects. Her lips are half-parted, adding a touch of mystery and sensuality. The composition is clean, dramatic, and focuses intensely on the face and glasses, with the hair flowing dynamically.

The female figure appears to have a slender build, as evidenced by the visible neckline and dÃ©colletÃ©. Due to the framing and clothing, it is impossible to determine the size of her breasts, the narrowness of her waist, the width of her hips, the thickness of her legs, or the size of her buttocks. The skin on her face and dÃ©colletÃ© is smooth and flawless, with a soft tan tone and a finish that subtly reflects the light.

The standout element is her sunglasses: a large, stylish, and modern pair with bright yellow frames and yellow or light orange lenses, adding a fashion-forward touch. The glasses cover much of her eyes, but her eyebrows and eyeliner are visible behind them.

She wears a dark garment, possibly a blouse or blazer, with a soft V-neckline that reveals a bit of her cleavage and part of a thin necklace with a small gold or silver pendant. The contrast between the black of the outfit and the vibrant colors of the background and the glasses is very effective.

Her hair is long, very straight, and black or very dark brown. The strands are shiny, healthy, and appear to be in motion, flowing slightly up and to the sides, as if blown by a gentle breeze or a studio fan, adding dynamism and drama to the image. It frames her face and falls over her shoulders and chest. The makeup is sophisticated and polished: the eyebrows are dark, full, and perfectly arched, creating a strong line above the glasses. The eyes are dramatically highlighted with precise black eyeliner and long, voluminous lashes visible through the lenses. The background is a completely smooth and uniform studio backdrop in a vibrant, saturated shade of egg yellow or golden orange. The solid, bright color creates a powerful contrast with the dark clothing and hair, making the figure stand out and creating an energetic, pop-art atmosphere. The lighting is studio-grade, professionally controlled, likely with a soft main light source (such as a beauty dish or large softbox) positioned frontally and slightly overhead, illuminating the face evenly and creating a soft glow on the skin. The lighting also highlights the movement and shine of the hair.

Camera Settings: Captured with a high-quality portrait prime lens (e.g., 85mm f/1.4 or 100mm f/2.0) on a full-frame camera for a sharp close-up with flattering compression and excellent background separation. Aperture set between f/2.8 and f/4.0 for a shallow depth of field that keeps the face and glasses in sharp focus, while the hair and background are softly blurred. ISO 100 for maximum studio image quality. Shutter speed from 1/160s to 1/250s. Studio lighting controlled with soft modifiers and perhaps a fan for the hair effect.

Photorealistic selfie of an adult woman (25+ years old) on a tropical beach.ï»¿

Hair: wet, wavy, medium-length hair reaching the shoulders, slightly messy from wind and seawater, individual strands sticking to the skin, some loose strands falling across the face.ï»¿

Camera & realism:ï»¿

Overall mood: relaxed, sensual tropical vacation vibe, realistic fashion photography, authentic summer atmosphere.ï»¿

The subject is wearing a loose, long white haute couture faux fur coat (fluffy and plush material), an extra-large thick red scarf, red gloves, and a simple plush hair clip, with snow traces on their outfit. The background is a snowy landscape (with bare branches and pine trees), and the snowflakes feature a layered dynamic of "large flakes falling + fine dust-like snow," creating a realistic, tangible texture of actual snowfall. The overall tone is warm and fresh, with a side backlight effect mimicking a Fujifilm camera film filter,and a slight graininess to the image 3:4

title: snow

A curved belt-skirt made of layered silver chains, pearls, and crystals, hugging the hips. A luxurious, dramatic look with an emphasis on textures: soft, fluffy white feathers contrasting with the shine of numerous silver rhinestone chains that create a flowing skirt effect. A crystal high choker collar, massive cuffs. Dark background, dramatic lighting, high fashion, expression, dynamic movement, studio photo, 8K

title: Glamorous Woman

prompt:
Photorealistic medium portrait captured with a Canon EOS R5 and 85mm f/1.4 lens, aperture f/2.2, ISO 200, using cinematic natural lighting The model, with identical facial features and proportions as in the reference photo, stands outdoors among snowy mountains, surrounded by three realistic alpacas with visible snow on their fur
She wears a matte dark red winter outfit a thick insulated jacket with a high collar, puffed sleeves, and matching ski pants. Her hair lies naturally, softly textured by the cold air. Gentle snow falls slowly, with individual snowflakes visible in her hair and on her clothing. The lighting is soft, diffused daylight emphasizing the contrast between the white snow and the black outfit. The alpacas stand close to the model, interacting with her naturally, creating a warm and lifelike atmosphere. The background is softly blurred for depth. Style 8K photorealism, ultra-realistic textures, cinematic winter fashion aesthetic

prompt: A black and white film photograph of a teenage girl sitting on the studio floor, legs spread and bent at the knees with feet toward the camera. She rests her right elbow on her knee with her hand on her cheek, head slightly tilted, gazing sideways and upward in a relaxed pose. Medium-to-full-length shot from a low floor-level angle. She is wearing a sleeveless white knit top tied at the waist, loose high-waisted rolled-up jeans, black sneakers with white laces, and striped socks. Plain light studio backdrop with seamless floor transition. Soft, even studio lighting, low contrast, no harsh shadows. Shot with a 50mm lens, medium depth of field, subtle film grain, highly detailed, photorealistic.
